  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(Guest guest, int walkIn, Date dt)
      Constructs an empty reservation requested by the guest, which requires the guest to indicate their check-in date, check-out date, number of adults and children and stores the reservation into the hotel's reservation database if successful.
      Parameters:
      guest - the guest's details. If the guest cannot found, the reservation cannot be made.
      walkIn - indicates if the Guest is booking a room via walk-in or reservation. Returns 0 if walk-in.
      dt - the date that the Reservation was made.

  • Method Details

    • getReservationCode

      public String getReservationCode()
      Gets the generated reservation code for the guest upon successful reservation.
      Returns:
      the generated reservation code tied to the guest.

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom()
      Gets the room that is available to the guest upon successful reservation.
      Returns:
      the room associated with the guest.

    • setRoom

      public void setRoom(Room room)
      Sets the room that is available to the guest upon successful reservation.
      Parameters:
      room - the room associated with the guest.

    • getGuest

      public Guest getGuest()
      Gets the guest that is associated with the reservation, together with their identification details.
      Returns:
      the guest that is associated with the reservation.

    • generateCode

      public void generateCode()
      A unique reservation code of six alpha-numeric characters will be generated and associated with the guest upon successful reservation.

    • getPayment

      public double getPayment()
      Gets the total payment for the guest's room charges. The total payment is calculated based on the number of weekdays and weekends and its associated weekday and weekend rates during the duration of the guest's hotel stay, depending on the type of room that the guest is staying in as well.
      Specified by:
      getPayment in interface Payment

    • printBill

      public void printBill()
      Displays the bill for the guest's room charges upon checking-out. The currency for the payment is in SGD.
      Specified by:
      printBill in interface Payment

    • useCreditCard

      public CreditCard useCreditCard()
      Asks the guest for the mode of payment, either by cash or credit card.
      Returns:
      the credit card number associated with the guest, if the guest indicates payment by credit card. Otherwise, the mode of payment is by cash.
